name: Fatal Evidence: The Cursed Island Collector’s Edition
storyline: Your sister’s old mentor has been murdered, and you’ve been called to his remote island home to investigate the case and look! You and your sister arrive just in time for the reading of the will. But this normal dinner quickly takes a dangerous turn when a masked judge traps everyone inside with the murderer, calling for their surrender! It’s up to you now to reveal the murderer’s identity and stop the judge from carrying out their sinister plans before it’s too late!
summary: Play these great object finding games full of puzzles, brain teasers and mini-games! You need to seek and find hidden objects and win this fun search and find finding object games!
